channel.title: Java and Class File Deleter [BATCH FILE]
channel.description:
Ok make a batch file called JavaAndClassDeleter.bat or anything you want actually. Now put this inside:
[code] @echo off :intro title Java and Class Deleting Batch File by Olan14 echo Type C or c to delete classes echo Type j or J to delete javas set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto :delclasses if %c%==C goto :declasses if %c%==j goto :deljavas if %c%==J goto :deljavas pause :delclasses del *class echo Congratulations Class files are deleted goto :done :deljavas title Deleting Javas del *java echo Nice Deleted All goto :done :done title Done echo You're done pause [/code] 100% Completely By Me
Atleast tell Me What I should work on if you use please.
EDIT my updated one which also can delete Jars: [code]@echo off :intro title Java, Class, and Jar Deleting Batch File by Olan14 cls echo Hi and Thank you for using my Batch File. echo I am Olan14 @ Sythe, RuneServer, Fagex, and my username @ Mopar is I am Olan14. echo So give me shout and rate my Batch =] echo Type c or C to delete classes echo Type j or J to delete javas echo Type j2 or J2 to delete jars set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto :delclasses if %c%==C goto :declasses if %c%==j goto :deljavas if %c%==J goto :deljavas if %c%==j2 goto :deljars if %c%==J2 goto :deljars pause :delclasses del *class echo Congratulations Class files are deleted goto :done :deljavas title Deleting Javas del *java echo Congratulations Java files are Deleted goto :done :deljars title Deleting Jars del *jar echo Congratulations Jar Executable files are Deleted goto :done :done title Done echo Thank You for using My Java, class, and Jar file deleter pause goto :intro [/code]

item.title: Java and Class File Deleter [BATCH FILE]
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

popcorn89:

I actually do this a lot when working with deobs…

Actually yeah, I do that too. But without all the gay echoing credits, etc.

@echo off del *class
(@echo off - so it doesn’t show the “C:\Documents and Settings” crap, it annoys me I like it neat)

Read full topic

item.title: Java and Class File Deleter [BATCH FILE]
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

I Am Olan14:

hey sorry thought I pressed general programming… Also pelase stop spamming my thread… and this makes it easier for the fact that you type one letter or a letter and a number and it deletes them in around2-5 seconds oppposed to spending like 5 minutes right-clicking then keft clicking. Also thank-you but I am not new to Java programming.

I really don’t want to start a flame war here, but you don’t need to right click>delete each file individually. You can click, ctrl, click, ctrl, etc., then shift+del.

Read full topic

item.title: Java and Class File Deleter [BATCH FILE]
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Ok make a batch file called JavaAndClassDeleter.bat or anything you want actually. Now put this inside:

@echo off
:intro
title Java and Class Deleting Batch File by Olan14
echo Type C or c to delete classes
echo Type j or J to delete javas
set /p c=Option: 
if %c%==c goto :delclasses
if %c%==C goto :declasses
if %c%==j goto :deljavas
if %c%==J goto :deljavas
pause
:delclasses
del *class
echo Congratulations Class files are deleted
goto :done
:deljavas
title Deleting Javas
del *java
echo Nice Deleted All
goto :done
:done
title Done
echo You're done
pause

100% Completely By Me

Atleast tell Me What I should work on if you use please.

EDIT my updated one which also can delete Jars:

@echo off :intro title Java, Class, and Jar Deleting Batch File by Olan14 cls echo Hi and Thank you for using my Batch File. echo I am Olan14 @ Sythe, RuneServer, Fagex, and my username @ Mopar is I am Olan14. echo So give me shout and rate my Batch =] echo Type c or C to delete classes echo Type j or J to delete javas echo Type j2 or J2 to delete jars set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto :delclasses if %c%==C goto :declasses if %c%==j goto :deljavas if %c%==J goto :deljavas if %c%==j2 goto :deljars if %c%==J2 goto :deljars pause :delclasses del *class echo Congratulations Class files are deleted goto :done :deljavas title Deleting Javas del *java echo Congratulations Java files are Deleted goto :done :deljars title Deleting Jars del *jar echo Congratulations Jar Executable files are Deleted goto :done :done title Done echo Thank You for using My Java, class, and Jar file deleter pause goto :intro

Read full topic
